ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well howdy, pardner! Good to see you again. Boss is waiting for ya upstairs, so get a move on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊，朋友！再次看到你真是太好了。老板正在楼上等你呢，快上去吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't look like you've brought back the Platinum Chip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像你还没把白金筹码带回来啊！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you mosey on back to wherever it is you left Benny cooling off? Come back when you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为何不再去本尼的尸体旁仔细搜一遍呢？等你找到了再回来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They never told us how expensive it was to get onto the Strip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们从来没说过去一趟长街要花这么多钱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never should have left California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就不该离开加利福尼亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That son of a bitch Keith cheated me! I know he did!
ESP.TRADUIT: 基斯那个狗娘养的骗了我！我就知道是他！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lose all your money too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也把钱全弄丢了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for getting me that pardon. Me and the boys will take good care of Primm, don't you worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你让他们赦免了我。我会和弟兄们守好普瑞姆的，别担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Sergeant Lee. Lieutenant Hayes radioed ahead to say you were on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是李中士。海耶斯中尉已经电告了你的到来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got surprise on our side, and that's about it. Once we blow a gap in the fence, we've got to pour on the fire and keep them disorganized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们准备了一个惊喜，就在这边。一旦在围墙上打出缺口，我们就会迅速发起突袭，打他们个措手不及。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our goal's to take out their leader, some assbag named Eddie. With the ringleader gone, the rest will fold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的目标是干掉他们的头目，一个叫埃迪的混蛋。没了领头的，剩下的全都不堪一击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all the briefing you're going to get. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务简报到此为止。我们上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been good to us, baby - now let us be good to you. We'd like you to enjoy this private suite as long as you're in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我们太好了，宝贝——让我们来报答你吧：在你离开这个镇子之前，随时都可以享用这个私人套间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Tops Floor Manager [00145F8A] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting way of handling things. Very sub rosa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你处理问题的方式很有趣。简直瞒天过海。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if the Scorpions deserve to be wiped out for something they didn't do, but that's one less problem Westside has to deal with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道毒蝎帮该不该因为自己没做过的事而落得个被全灭的下场，但西区确实少了一个麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anderson turned in for the wrong reason and Westside gets to keep siphoning water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安德森蒙冤进了大牢，西区可以继续抽水用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard to find justice in all of this, but I suppose this is as close as it gets. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这事从头到尾都谈不上公正，但我想结果也算可以接受。谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家扔手雷

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scatter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快散开！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让开！

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
ESP.TRADUIT: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep that shit away from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那狗屁玩意收走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck do you think you're doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的以为你在干嘛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put that away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那东西拿开！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mind your weapon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 收好你的武器！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons use is discouraged. Thank you for your cooperation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 禁止使用武器，谢谢合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please do not use your weapons. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请勿使用武器，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do that someplace else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去别的地方找靶子吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tryin' to get me killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想打死我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holster that. And be quick about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把枪收好。快点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holster your iron, pardner!
ESP.TRADUIT: 收起枪，哥们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 死！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么做！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Do that somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！要开枪就去别的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What in tarnation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么鬼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What in blazes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞毛啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ammo costs money, you know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要知道，买弹药是要花钱的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么毛病？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knock it off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别弄了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit fuckin' around!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈再捣乱了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
ESP.TRADUIT: PLAYER IN IRON SITES

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you line that up on a tin can instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不你找一个罐头盒试试？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even kid about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不好笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're lookin' at a heap of trouble if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你想惹麻烦，那你尽管来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you think you want trouble, then let fly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你想找事，那就放马过来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even joke like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别开这种玩笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point that somewhere else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别拿枪头对着我！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That safety better be on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这枪的保险最好打开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point that somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把枪头拿开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For Pete's sake...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天……

ESP.ORIGINAL: No respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真没教养。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop that. I mean it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的。住手！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit it. You're making me nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪放下。你让我很紧张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead. Try me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧。你有种试试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you're tough, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是不是觉得你自己很行，啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be advised, assaulting an officer of the law will not be tolerated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意，攻击执法者是不可容忍的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be advised, assaulting an officer of the law is a serious offense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意，攻击执法者是严重违法行为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I don't see that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我瞎了么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't tempt me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别惹我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By Caesar, you're walking a fine line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以凯撒的名义警告你，小心玩火自焚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck do you think you are?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的认为自己是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point that shit somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那鬼东西拿开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think about it too hard and you'll get burned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别老想着动粗，你这样会完蛋的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch where you point that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意你的指向。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rex defaults to melee attacks since he has no ranged weapons.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [雷克斯由于没有远距离武器所以默认为使用近战攻击。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <aroo?>
ESP.TRADUIT: <啊呜？>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about REPCONN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说REPCONN吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just know what I've heard. There's supposed to be some ghouls that went in a while back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也只是略知一二。好像不久前有一伙尸鬼进到里面去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every so often there'll be a commotion from that direction - explosions and such.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后时不时就会从那个方向传来骚动——爆炸之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, saints alive. That is a load off. Nothing to be done, though. Those ghouls just didn't know when they weren't wanted. Couldn't take a hint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗，您可真是活神仙啊，让人松了口气。看来我们也不必再操心了。那些尸鬼根本不知道自己不受欢迎。真是些不开窍的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And aren't you just the most unexpected gift our little town ever had? Here, take this. And go buy yourself something nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您该不会就是老天爷赐给我们这座小镇的礼物吧？来吧，拿着这些。给自己买点好吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the ghouls at REPCONN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀掉了REPCONN的尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave? I don't believe that was what was discussed. They could be back tomorrow knocking on my door wanting hand-outs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶走？我记得当初咱们可不是这么约定的，弄不好他们明天就会再跑上门来找我要饭呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I know what I promised, but my mind is just not at ease about this. I'm afraid I can't pay you for what you done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，虽然我确实做了承诺，但这一结果并不能让我放心。恐怕我不能付你钱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the ghouls to leave the area. They won't be bothering you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把尸鬼赶出了这片区域，他们不会再来找你麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you make the training VR yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个模拟训练是你自己做的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not far from it. When we reclaimed this bunker, I found a number of VR tapes. Most were corrupted, but a few programs still ran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多吧。我们进驻地堡的时候，我找到了一些模拟磁卡。大部分都损坏了，不过一些程序还能运行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Using those as my foundation, I was able to code the training VR, as well as other applications.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以此为基础，我编写了一整套模拟训练程序，还有一些别的应用程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do all of the brothers use this equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的兄弟们都用这套装备？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone in the base has to spend a minimum of five hours a week running tactical simulations, but outside that, interest is scarce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基地里的每个人每周至少要花五个小时进行战术模拟，不过除此之外，也没多少人会对这个感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't always this way. When we first moved into the bunker, everyone was so excited that the VR systems were intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前可不是这样的。我们刚进驻地堡时，模拟训练系统运转良好，每个人都跃跃欲试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over time, though, my fellows have become listless and less entertained by the wonders of technology around us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，一段时间后，伙伴们就对这里的各种科技失去了兴致，变得无精打采了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why Apprentice Watkins is such a joy to work with. Her unbridled enthusiasm for virtual combat is unparalleled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才会如此高兴能与学徒沃特金斯一块儿共事。她对模拟战斗似乎有着无限的热情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you are?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the outsider. I suppose it's too much to ask that jarhead Ramos to keep outsiders away from my research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，外来人。我记得我已经叫锅盖头拉莫斯让外来人远离我的研究了啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Head Scribe Taggart, and I am much too busy to deal with the likes of you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是首席学士塔格特，我现在手头有不少事务，没空搭理你这类人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LtHayesPrisonAttackFail
ESP.TRADUIT: LtHayesPrisonAttackFail

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes this a "dangerous place?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里怎么变成"凶险之地"了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must've heard her radio broadcasts? Though why a human would follow her invitation here is beyond me... unless you didn't listen very closely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定听过她的广播节目吧？我真不明白为什么一个人类会听从她的指引来到这里……估计你是没有仔细听她说什么吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The voice on the radio belongs to Tabitha, the "supreme commander" of Black Mountain - or, as she calls it, the "State of Utobitha."
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个广播是塔比瑟开的，她是黑山——或者按她的叫法，"乌托比萨共和国"的"最高指挥官。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: She took control of this place almost two years ago. The Super Mutants here do whatever she says - and she says humans are to be killed on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她大约在两年前控制了这里。这里的超级变种人都听她的——她还下令见到人类就格杀勿论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still plenty of other problems keeping the 15 shut down, though. Thanks for playing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要重开15号州际公路，还需要解决其他很多问题。不过还是感谢你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made sure those prisoners won't bother Primm anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定那些囚犯不会再入侵普瑞姆了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll help. Still plenty of problems out that way, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确有所帮助。但那条路还是有很多问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I restored rule of law to Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恢复了普瑞姆的秩序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You took out a Deathclaw nest? Either you're lying, or you're tougher than you look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你清理掉了一个死亡爪巢穴？如果你没撒谎的话，那你可是比看上去厉害多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still plenty of troubles out that way, though. Thanks for playing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那条路还是有很多问题。感谢你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the Deathclaw Alpha Male and Mother at Quarry Junction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在采石场杀死了死亡爪首领和母兽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's impressive - if you're telling the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你说的都是真的，那真是叫人敬佩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it'll take some time for routes to readjust. I expect I'll be working from here for the foreseeable future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，重新调整路线依旧要花些时间。估计我还是得在这里呆上一阵子了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've cleared all the trouble west of here. Caravans can start using I-15 again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经清除了西边所有的麻烦。商队可以再次使用15号州际公路了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's usually a gun merchant hanging around topside. I'm sure she'll take care of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面有个武器商人。她肯定会接待你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So where can I buy some weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我在哪可以买到武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I selling? Yeah. Am I selling to you? No. Sorry to hurt your feelings, but you're small time. Move along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是有在卖东西。但卖给你？没门。很抱歉伤害了你的感情，可你毕竟是个无名小卒，走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你的货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's nice. I suspect we'll stick around here, though. Business has been good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那挺好。不过我觉得在这儿待着也行。现在生意还不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Primm's safe now. I took care of those prisoners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆现在安全了。我处理掉了那些囚犯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Michelle. My Dad and me run this store. His name's Samuel. I take the day shift and he takes nights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫蜜雪儿。我老爸和我开了这家店，他叫塞缪尔。我上白班，他上晚班。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came here about a month ago, when Primm went to hell on account of the prison break north of there. Found a bin to call home and set up shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约一个月前，普瑞姆北面的监狱发生暴乱，我们待不下去了，就来了这里。我们找了一个棚屋当房子，然后开了这家店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess that makes you a big hero - in Primm. Like I said, me and Michelle didn't sit around waiting to be saved. Business is better here, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我该称你为普瑞姆的大英雄了。不过我之前说了，我和蜜雪儿不想靠别人救济。何况这里的生意比那儿更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took care of those prisoners myself. Primm is clear now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲自处理掉了那些囚犯。普瑞姆现在安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Samuel Kerr at your service. Me and my daughter Michelle run this fine establishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞缪尔·科尔，乐意为您服务。小店是由我和我的女儿蜜雪儿经营的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came here from Primm about a month past. Doesn't look like much, but it's one hell of a location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们大约一个月前从普瑞姆搬到这里。虽然看着挺破，但绝对是个好地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did Tabitha end up in control?
ESP.TRADUIT: 塔比瑟是怎么得到控制权的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, Black Mountain was a peaceful community. Its leader, Marcus, broadcast an invitation to Mutants throughout the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多年以前，黑山还是一片祥和之地。当时的首领马可世通过无线电向散落在废土各地的变种人发出邀请。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how I found Black Mountain. So did others, most of them second generation Mutants. Marcus welcomed everyone - that was his mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是这样来到黑山的。其他人也是——他们大部分是第二代变种人。马可世欢迎每个人的到来，可他错就错在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The community ended up being mostly second gen - not very bright, but easy to influence. Fine, until the Nightkin came along, led by Tabitha...
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终这里的第二代变种人占了多数——他们不够聪明，很容易受外界的影响。后来，塔比瑟带着夜行族来到了这里……

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a week she had most of the second-gens thinking she was some kind of prophet - and that she should be broadcasting her "truth," not Marcus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只用了一周的时间，她就让大部分第二代变种人对她顶礼膜拜。他们认为她是先知，她传播的才是"真理"，而马可世只是个骗子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcus saw what was coming and decided to leave before things got out of hand. He smashed the radio and left to found Jacobstown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是马可世决定在事情失控之前离开黑山。他毁掉了无线电，之后又建立了杰克博镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are some Super Mutants smarter than others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么有的超级变种人会比其他的聪明？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not all Super Mutants were created equal. Or at the same time, or for the same purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并非所有的超级变种人都是按照同一标准制造的。要么是批次上的区别，要么就是制造目的上的区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first generation tends to be smarter, stronger, and... more civilized, I suppose you could say, than the ones made later, save the Nightkin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与之后制造的相比，第一代超级变种人更聪明，更强壮，也更……文明——大概你会这么说吧，当然夜行族除外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem friendly, for a mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以一个变种人来说，你很友好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep saying things like that, and I won't be so friendly. Not every Super Mutant is a brain-damaged brute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再这么说，我就不友好了。又不是所有的超级变种人脑子都有问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of us are just as intelligent as basic humans - and the rest don't really have any choice in the matter, do they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中大部分的智力水平都和普通人类一样——至于剩下的那部分，他们也不想的，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is this water so special?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这水为什么这么特别？

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Cause it's clean. The crops taste funny if you don't use clean water, but the NCR won't give us any and it's too expensive to buy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为它干净。如果不用纯净水灌溉，种出来的庄稼会有奇怪的味道。但NCR根本不给我们提供纯净水，我们也买不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keely's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基利死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? But that's... terrible. You're sure? You saw her body? With the way she looks, maybe she just seemed dead, and she really wasn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？这简直……太可怕了。你确定吗？你看到尸体了？以她的长相来说，她可能只是看起来死了，但其实没有……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angela Williams [000F2746] (file) Comment (NAM2) : realizing that her friend is really dead EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... you've seen enough death to know the difference. I didn't mean to sound ungrateful. I know you tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……你见过很多死人，肯定能看出区别。我不是不感谢你。我知道你尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angela Williams [000F2746] (file) Comment (NAM2) : realizing that her friend is really dead EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keely was brilliant... she'd seen so much. What a horrible waste...
ESP.TRADUIT: 基利非常出色……她见过那么多世面。真是太可惜了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angela Williams [000F2746] (file) Comment (NAM2) : very sad, crushed. Play this line is player didn't recover Keely's notes. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keely's dead. But I found her research notes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基利死了。但是我找到了她的研究笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? But that's... terrible. You're sure? You saw her body? With the way she looks, maybe she just seemed dead, and she really wasn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？这简直……太可怕了。你确定吗？你看到尸体了？以她的长相来说，她可能只是看起来死了，但其实没有……

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... you've seen enough death to know the difference. I didn't mean to sound ungrateful. I know you tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……你见过很多死人，肯定能看出区别。我不是不感谢你。我知道你尽力了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The notes count for something. I'll keep them safe. Keely's work in the vault won't be lost, and it won't be forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些笔记相当珍贵。我会好好保管的。基利在避难所中的工作不会被遗忘的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sent to fetch some research data. No one said anything about a rescue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来找研究数据的。没人跟我提过还要救人什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you got sent on the same fool's errand I did, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你跟我是被同一个白痴糊弄进来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your friend Nephi?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友尼法出什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never was able to reach him. He has allowed drugs and hatred to consume him. He runs with the Fiends north of here, now. They call him Driver Nephi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直没能联系上他。他任由毒品和仇恨腐蚀自己。现在，他又加入了北边的恶魔帮。人们管他叫球杆尼法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orris shouldn't be a problem any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欧里斯不会再是个麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so it went down like that, huh? I guess it can't be helped now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，所以你们最后谈崩了吗？那看来也没什么好说的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not subtle, but you get the job done. That's good enough for me. Maybe you can help me with something more important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然你不太懂得变通，但你还是完成了任务，这对我来说已经够了。也许你能帮我做些更重要的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orris is a fraud. He fakes attacks on his clients and then plays hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欧里斯是个骗子。他制造有人袭击的假象，然后自己再扮成英雄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's how it happens... Okay, then. I'll have some guys pull him off the street when no one's looking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来是这样……好吧。我会叫几个手下趁人不注意的时候把他拖出去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've shown me something, so maybe you can help me with a matter that's a little more important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你展现了你的实力，也许你能帮我做些更重要的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, then. Once you part ways, return here. I'll look forward to hearing your report. Oh, and take this to cover the hiring cost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，等他做完了你这单生意，你就回来找我复命。我期待着你的报告。噢，这些钱你拿去，雇他的费用我替你垫了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to back him up. See this through, and there'll be something good waiting for you when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能给他搭把手。只要这事顺利解决，等你回来，我不会亏待你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spoke to Clanden, and I couldn't get anything out of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和克兰顿谈过了，但没套出什么话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, this is Clanden. This guy is one sick motherfucker. The way I see it, you have a few options.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，是克兰顿，这个烂杂种。我觉得你有好几种办法来对付他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you could use what's on these tapes to get him by himself, or maybe you could use them to leverage him out of the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以利用磁带上的这些东西引他单独出来，或者用它们来逼他离开赌场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found these tapes in Clanden's room. Can you verify this is him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在克兰顿的房间里找到了这些磁带，你看看这是他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep it to yourself, but Hanlon is the one behind the misinformation. He's got a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说了你可不要告诉别人，汉隆是信息误报的幕后主使。他有他的打算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chief? But, he's a legend! I guess if he's got a plan behind it all, who am I to question it? I won't say a word about it to anyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军士长？但，他是传奇人物啊！就算他真的有什么计划，我又有什么资格质疑？这件事我不会跟别人说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Private Stone was stealing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是。列兵斯通偷的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate you doing this for me. Here's a little something for your trouble, it's not much, but it's all I can spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮我做这件事让我非常感激。这里是一点小意思，数量不多，但是我只能省出这么多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Richards [00120DCD] (file) Quest : ([001214AA]VMS30) Restoring Hope EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about the attack on Nelson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈关于攻击纳尔逊的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you something to thank you for helping us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你些东西作为回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Major Polatli [00120DCC] (file) Quest : ([001214AA]VMS30) Restoring Hope EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wanted to scare the NCR into retreating from this region - all to save lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想吓跑进入这个区域的NCR部队——他只是为了避免继续有人伤亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chief should've known that the NCR is too stubborn to back down from anything, even when it's for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军士长应该清楚，即便是明白利害关系，NCR对到手的东西也是不会轻易放弃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm glad it wasn't an enemy who was spreading lies and killing morale, I'm disappointed that a legend like the Chief felt he had to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我很高兴散布谣言、打击士气的并不是敌人，可我对军士长的做法还是很失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not important. It's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不重要。都结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever the Chief had in mind, I'm sure it was the right thing to do - even if it did end up scaring a lot of people in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论军士长的动机是什么，我都相信他的判断——即便这样的举动会吓着许多人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's complicated. Hanlon caused the misinformation, but I convinced him to stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 挺复杂的。总之就是汉隆制造了虚假消息，不过我劝服他收手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... what? Why would he do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等……什么？他为什么要那样做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is that fool doing? I need you to head out there and try to defuse the situation. Tell them I'm willing to cooperate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个傻瓜在干什么？我要你马上过去平息事态。告诉他们我愿意合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about your siblings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我讲讲你的兄弟姐妹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're a wild bunch. There's my sister Frieda, who used to run this branch but took off to pursue "the opportunity of a lifetime", as she put it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一群人都很野。我姐姐弗莉达以前经营这个分店，不过后来她撂挑子跑了，说是要去追寻 "一生的机遇"。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest are all long stories, and I don't got the time to tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人的故事也很多，但我现在没有时间讲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to fight in the arena.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进竞技场挑战一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only you may enter. Tell your companion to wait and speak to me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只能一个人进去。让你的同伴等着，然后再来找我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Agreed. If we take the power plant, this battle is over. I'll have my men focus their efforts there. May the Son of Mars go with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 同意。只要控制发电厂，战斗就会结束。我会让我的人马集中进攻那里。愿战神之子庇护着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Centurion [0013CA37] (file) Quest : ([00137AB9]VHDLegionBattle) Veni, Vidi, Vici EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The power plant is what really matters. Have all of your men attack there. I'll finish things here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发电厂才是关键所在。让你的全部人马进攻那里。这边的活我来搞定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody who threatens me lives to tell about it. Not even Nightkin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敢威胁我的人都休想活命，即便是夜行族也一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Speech 80 >
[FAILED] No more negotiating, and definitely no more waiting. This is your last chance before we take it by force.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不必白费口舌了，我也没耐心再等。这是你最后的机会，否则我们只能采取武力了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Henry doesn't have the cure just yet, but he's almost there. Be patient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨利医生还没研究出治疗方法，但已经快了。耐心点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this initiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 入盟仪式是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody has to do it. Well, everybody who wants to be a Khan, anyways. They toss you into the ring there and beat on you for a solid minute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都要过这一关。呃，我指的是想要加入大汗帮的人。他们会把你扔进场子里，然后让你整整挨上一分钟的打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you survive, you're in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还能喘气儿，就算通过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give Med-X> Painkillers like these, you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: <拿出吗啡针-X> 你意思是这种止痛药？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa... you were serious. Okay, yeah, this might just work. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇……你动真格的呀。好吧，对，没准还真能派上用场。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just wait here a minute, I'll be back with some Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我一会儿，我去带些吗啡针-X回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Wow, um... okay. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？哇哇，哦……好的。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just cheat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么不耍个花招呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cheat? The only way I could cheat is if I was so doped up on painkillers that I don't feel anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耍花招？我唯一能耍的花招就是吃止痛药吃到中毒，让自己彻底失去知觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like you're not happy being a Great Khan. Maybe you'd be happier someplace else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像不太喜欢大汗帮啊。那你还是找个喜欢的地方呆着吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah, maybe you're right. Maybe I can find my true calling, someplace they'll appreciate my poetry! Someplace like the Old Mormon Fort, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 也许你说得对。没准还真有适合我的地方，在那儿会有人欣赏我的诗！说不定旧摩门教要塞就是这样的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think the Followers of the Apocalypse would take me? I remember all those books they brought us when they visited our tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得天启追随者会接纳我吗？他们造访我们部落时带来的那些书，我全都记得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I don't know... the Khans don't really get me, but at least they're family, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我不知道……大汗帮确实不适合我，但至少他们是我的家人，你明白吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should just ditch this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你该离开这地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't sound so bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来还不太坏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, maybe not if you're some hulking reprobate like Regis or baked to the gills like Jack. I've tried five times and still haven't made it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那当然，如果你像雷吉斯那样四肢发达，或者杰克那样结实耐打，肯定很容易。我试了五次，都没成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能和我说说大汗帮吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you they're a bunch of big dumb jerks with no appreciation for art. I mean, can you believe their initiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告诉你，这帮家伙就是一群酒囊饭袋，根本不懂艺术。你能想象他们居然还要搞这种入盟仪式吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要个房间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Proceed to your accomodations. Please, enjoy your stay at Vault 21.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请前往您的房间，希望您在21号避难所住得愉快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's a Securitron doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 电子保安在这里干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 21's previous manager is no longer capable of servicing your needs. Hotel arrangement functions are now purview of Mr. House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 21号避难所的前任经理已无法再为您效劳了。旅馆的经营业务现在由豪斯先生全权接管。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've convinced me. Your secret is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说服了我，我不会泄露你的秘密的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you're working for Caesar or if desperation's made me a heck of a lot more persuasive. Either way, this is the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道究竟是因为你在为凯撒卖命，还是因为走投无路的人说话更有分量。总之，你这么做是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I trust we're done discussing this. I'm going to step through that door and pretend like we never had this talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我想咱们应该是商量完了。我打算从那道门出去，咱们就当这场谈话从未发生过吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are the details of the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个计划详细流程是怎样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again, goal number one is to eliminate Mr. House and install my neuro-computational matrix on the Lucky 38's mainframe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再说一次，第一步，必须消灭豪斯先生，然后将我的神经元运算系统植入幸运38的中央主机里！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given how you're a new arrival, I also recommend that you get to know some of the region's tribes, so you can decide how you feel about them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你初来乍到，我建议你先结交一些本地的势力，好对他们有个初步的印象！

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the time you've finished up all of that, the Legion should be close to attacking Hoover Dam and we'll execute the last phase of the plan!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一切快大功告成时，军团也差不多该攻打胡佛水坝了，到那时，我们就执行这项计划的最后一步！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to go to the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好去水坝了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! So I've been looking over Mr. House's force projections and running some calculations...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我刚刚查阅了豪斯先生就双方兵力所作的评估，还进行了一番运算……

ESP.ORIGINAL: It turns out there are two ways we can win this thing! Hear that? We have options!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果是，我们有两种方法可以取胜！听见没？我们有得选！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, Gloria's going to be pissed when she hears about this. Still, he started it, so we probably won't go to war with the Kings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，老兄，格罗利亚知道了肯定会发火的。不过话说回来，又不是我们先动的手，猫王帮大概不会和我们撕破脸吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Van Graff Thug [00118374] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The slaughter of the Van Graffs and the Crimson Caravan caused no end of trouble for NCR back West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范格拉夫家族和深红商队的灭门惨案给西部的NCR带来了无穷无尽的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already struggling, NCR's supply lines suffered further as the two caravans withdrew support until the "massacre in the East" was resolved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两大商队宣称，除非“东部大屠杀”得到解决，否则他们就无限期撤销对NCR的支援，这令原本就举步维艰的NCR补给线雪上加霜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The caravan families went so far as to send agents East to hunt down Cass and the Courier. None returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 商人集团甚至派密探到东边去追杀卡斯和邮差。但一个都没回来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both companies finally decided not to chase their losses. The week after their decision, the headquarters of both companies were destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两家商队最终决定不再扩大损失。他们决定后的那个星期，两家商队的总部都被摧毁了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The graffiti, "see you in hell" written in gunpowder, was attributed to Powder Gangers, not the Cassidy Caravan massacre so long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那幅用火药写成的“在地狱里见”的涂鸦，被认定为是“炸药帮”所为，而不是很久之前那场盖西迪商队大屠杀
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the years following the destruction of Cassidy Caravans, NCR used evidence of the plot to blackmail the Crimson Caravan and the Van Graffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盖西迪商队覆灭后的数年间，NCR一直在利用手头的证据胁迫深红商队公司和范格拉夫家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR enacted strict trade laws with little resistance, strengthening their supply lines and their position in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR毫无阻力地颁布了严格的贸易法令，不仅强化了后勤保障，也巩固了自身在莫哈维的地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both the Van Graffs and Alice McLafferty were removed from their post in the East.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范格拉夫和爱丽丝·麦克拉弗蒂都被从东边的岗位上撤职了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: During their trek West, however, their caravan was wiped out by raiders using advanced weaponry and military tactics. No cargo was taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，在他们向西行进的途中，他们的商队被一群使用先进武器和军事战术的掠夺者消灭了。没有任何货物被抢走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When questioned, the Gun Runners denied any involvement, claiming they would have no... public motivation for such an attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当被问及此事时，枪支走私者否认了任何与此有关的事情，声称他们没有... 动机组织这样的攻击
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Barter Options>
ESP.TRADUIT: <砍价选项>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I see the wisdom in that. I'll radio for a unit to head up to Primm and offer some additional support.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 言之有理，我会派一支部队去普瑞姆，并且给那边提供一点额外的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having Primm - and the trade route - under NCR control would help the West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将普瑞姆及附近的商路都控制在NCR手上，对西边会比较有利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll look for your men and supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去寻找你的人和补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Watch your back out there. Never know when those Legion bastards might show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。在那要保持警惕。你永远都不知道那些军团杂种会什么时候出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster Mayes [00120DCE] (file) Quest : ([001214AA]VMS30) Restoring Hope EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do what I can - and those folks that got killed need to be answered for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽力而为——必须要给那些被杀害的人一个说法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Tell the troops to come protect Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。命令部队来保护普瑞姆吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger, I'll radio them over now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解，我会用无线电联系他们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I get to kill you over and over again. <Attack Yes Man.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就一次又一次地杀死你！<攻击好好先生。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahaha! I knew there was a positive in it somewhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈！我就知道你有这种干劲！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我怎么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I could, but I'm neuro-computationally incapable of making decisions like this one! It's up to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想告诉你该怎么做，可我的神经演算根本无法作出决定！只能靠你自己了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already made arrangements with the Followers. I'm ready to fight at the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经和天启追随者达成了协议，水坝的战斗我也准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! So I've been looking over Mr. House's force projections and running some calculations...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我刚刚查阅了豪斯先生就双方兵力所作的评估，还进行了一番运算……

ESP.ORIGINAL: It turns out there are two ways we can win this thing! Hear that? We have options!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果是，我们有两种方法可以取胜！听见没？我们有得选！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are they doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what they're up to and I don't want to know. I just hope no harm comes to Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道它们在做什么，也不想知道。我只希望不会损害到诺瓦克的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much to live off of around here, except salvage from that factory. If they made off with anything expensive, we'd be hurting something fierce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了去那家工厂里捡废品，这附近没什么能赖以为生的活计。如果它们拿走了什么值钱的东西，那我们损失可就大了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I will say this. If all of 'em turned up dead tomorrow, I couldn't see as to how they'd be missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我可以这么说。要是它们明天早上全死了，也没人会惦记它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That might even be a desirable thing, knowing the town was safe from the likes of them. There'd be a reward in it if some brave soul made it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果镇子能不受它们侵害的话，那真的很让人高兴。如果有哪位勇士能让这愿望成真的话，我们是不会亏待他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't like it, leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看不下去，就走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mind if I do. Enjoy your reign as King Scumbag the First, Overlord of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真走了你可别后悔。好好享受加冕人渣之王的快感吧，西区霸主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mind if I do. Enjoy your reign as Queen Scumbag the First, Overlord of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真走了你可别后悔。好好享受加冕人渣女王的快感吧，西区霸主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've helped out around here, sending troops to Primm will fortify the NCR in the region.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把这附近的问题都解决了，往普瑞姆派兵可以增强NCR在这一地区的防御力量。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see the wisdom in that. I'll radio for a unit to head up to Primm and offer some additional support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 言之有理，我会派一支部队去普瑞姆，并且给那边提供一点额外的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I Fought the Law
ESP.TRADUIT: 法律斗士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with Chavez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决查韦斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dealt with Chavez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查韦斯已经被解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shake down the water merchant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 勒索贩水商。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Water merchant" dealt with. Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: "贩水商人"已经处理了。回去找埃迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Merchant killed. Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贩水商人被杀了。回去报告埃迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scout Primm and find out what the NCR's up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查普瑞姆，弄清楚NCR的企图。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到埃迪处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rendezvous with Sergeant Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与李中士碰头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死埃迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到埃迪处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR CF quests complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR劳教所任务完成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eddie taken out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经除掉了埃迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: VMS02 Failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: VMS02 Failed.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with Chavez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 处理查韦斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Track down the suspicious merchant and get rid of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到那个可疑的商人并除掉他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to the locals in Primm and learn what - if anything - the NCR is planning for the correctional facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与普瑞姆的当地人交谈，了解NCR是否有计划夺回劳教所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Eddie that you dealt with Chavez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉埃迪你已经处理了查韦斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到埃迪处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report back to Eddie with information on the NCR's planned attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去报告埃迪，说NCR已经做好进攻的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rendezvous with Sergeant Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与李中士碰头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死埃迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到埃迪处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Betray Eddie by offering Lieutenant Hayes assistance in retaking the prison.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)背叛埃迪并在海耶斯中尉重夺监狱的过程中给予帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghost Town Gunfight
ESP.TRADUIT: 鬼城枪战

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Sunny Smiles about fighting the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和微笑桑尼谈谈对抗炸药帮的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Enlist the help of Trudy.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)获得特鲁迪的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Convince Chet to open his store's stock to the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)说服切特让他打开镇上已经关闭的商店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Acquire Easy Pete's dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)获取轻松皮特的炸药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ringo when you're ready for the gunfight with the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找林戈准备和炸药帮的人大干一场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打败炸药帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ringo and let him know that Sunny Smiles has agreed to help you fight the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到林戈处让他知道微笑桑尼已经答应了与你一起对抗炸药帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Offer to help Ringo deal with the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主动提出帮助林戈对付炸药帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Acquire additional medical supplies from Doc Mitchell.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)从米切尔医生处获得额外的药品补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Join up with Sunny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和桑尼汇合。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Restoring Hope
ESP.TRADUIT: 重修舟釜

ESP.ORIGINAL: Major Polatli wants me to help around camp. Go talk to Quartermaster Mayes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波拉特里少校希望我能在营地里帮忙。去和军需官梅斯谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quartermaster Mayes wants me to find some supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军需官梅斯希望我能帮忙找找物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found the supplies and need to return them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了补给物资并要将它们带回。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already had the supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经拿到了补给品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I returned the supplies. Now talk to Major Polatli.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带回了补给物资，和波拉特里上校谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Richards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和理查兹谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr Richards wants me to do something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理查兹医生希望我能做点事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not Qualified to help medically.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有足够的能力提供医疗上的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I messed up royally helping Dr. Richards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在试图帮助理查兹的时候彻底搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I messed up and Richards stopped me from doing more harm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在帮助的时候搞砸了，理查兹博士阻止了我，免得我闹出更大的乱子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't able to do much for Dr. Richards (or at least I didn't mess things up).
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没有能力帮助理查兹医生。(但至少我还没把事情弄砸)。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was able to help Dr. Richards and I did well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有能力帮助理查兹医生，而且我做得很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Polatli about the last stage of the quest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和波拉特里谈谈最后一个需要你完成的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Polatli mention Nelson assault, not accepted yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波拉特里提到了进攻纳尔逊的事，你还没有接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assault Nelson. (Talk to Cooper)
ESP.TRADUIT: 进攻纳尔逊。(和库珀交谈)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack on Nelson Started
ESP.TRADUIT: 纳尔逊之战已经开始了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nelson Already Reclaimed. Good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 纳尔逊已经被夺回了。干得好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nelson reclaimed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夺回了纳尔逊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest Completed
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务完成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Restoring Hope Completed
ESP.TRADUIT: 重修釜舟完成

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to HELIOS One to ask about Forlorn Hope supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去太阳神一号电站问问送往飘零希望营地的物资的下落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Major Polatli.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与波拉特里少校交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return the supplies to Quartermaster Mayes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把物资交给军需官梅耶斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Quartermaster Mayes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和军需官梅耶斯交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet with Dr. Richards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和理查德医生碰面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Dr. Richards with his patients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助理查德医生治疗患者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Major Polatli.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到波拉特里少校处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Polatli about the victory at Nelson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉波拉特里纳尔逊取胜的捷报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet with Sergeant Cooper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和库珀中士见面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat the Legion at Nelson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打败纳尔逊的军团部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow the GPS marker to the Forlorn Hope supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随着GPS信号找到飘零希望营地的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Dr. Richards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到理查德医生处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eureka!
ESP.TRADUIT: 灵光一现！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Battle Started for NCR Side
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR方面的战斗开始了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Battle Done
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗结束

ESP.ORIGINAL: Game Over
ESP.TRADUIT: 游戏结束

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Mike Lawson suggested flushing the Legionnaires through the turbines to stop their invasion of the station.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）麦克·劳森建议你用涡轮机清剿来犯的军团，阻止他们入侵发电厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is attacking Hoover Dam, the Legate's camp must be destroyed to protect the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团正在进攻胡佛大坝，必须摧毁副帅的营地才能保护大坝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Activate the pressure release valve to flush the Legionnaires through the turbines.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）打开泄压阀，利用涡轮机把军团士兵冲走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dam overflow has been diverted into the turbines, the Legion can no longer use them to access the power plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坝的水流已经被引到了涡轮机里，军团再也无法利用它们来入侵发电厂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The battle has been won. Return to General Oliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗胜利了。回去向奥利佛将军报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veni, Vidi, Vici
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来，我见，我征服

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, the player must make their way across the dam to the Power Plant, where General Oliver resides.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，玩家必须穿越大坝前往发电厂，那里住着奥利弗将军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once in the Power Plant, the player must make his/her way to General Oliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦进入发电厂，玩家必须前往奥利弗将军那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the player finds General Oliver, if he can't be talked out of it, a battle begins!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当玩家找到奥利弗将军时，如果他无法被说服，战斗就开始了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: After killing or driving off General Oliver, the game ends, and there is much rejoicing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在杀死或赶走奥利弗将军后，游戏结束，并伴随着阵阵欢呼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cross the dam and make your way to the western power plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过大坝并设法进入西侧发电厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the enemy commander, General Oliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到敌人的指挥官奥利佛将军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Legate and tell him that General Oliver has been killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找副帅，告诉他奥利佛将军已经被杀死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Legate and tell him that General Oliver has been driven off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找副帅，告诉他奥利佛将军已经逃跑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill General Oliver and the soldiers guarding him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死奥利佛将军和保护他的士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Take out the snipers who've taken up position in the western portion of the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)解决掉大坝西侧的狙击手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Release the waiting Legion reinforcements inside the intake tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)与进水塔中待命的军团援军取得联系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Gods, No Masters
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有救世主，也不靠神仙皇帝

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Control Room in Hoover Dam and install the override chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往胡佛大坝的控制室安装强制覆写芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reactivate Securitrons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次启动安保系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy Generators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head topside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往顶层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the Legate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付副帅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with General Oliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付奥利佛将军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Yes Man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到好好先生处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Completed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 通关！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Control Room in Hoover Dam and install the override chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往胡佛大坝的控制室安装强制覆写芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the eastern power plant to power the Securitron Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动东部发电厂，激活电子保安部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy the dam generators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破坏大坝发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exit out to the east side of the Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从东侧离开大坝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head to the Legate's camp and deal with the Legate and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往副帅的大营，与副帅和凯撒军团谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with General Oliver and the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与奥利佛将军和NCR部队谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Yes Man with news of your victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯旋回到好好先生处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All or Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 不成功，便成仁

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Power Plant Control Room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往发电机控制室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unleash the Securitrons! Armies! Will! Clash!
ESP.TRADUIT: 解锁安保系统！机器大军！全军出击！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head Topside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往顶层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the Legate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付副帅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Mr House and inform him of your victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯旋回到豪斯先生处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Completed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 通关！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Control Room in Hoover Dam and install the override chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往胡佛大坝的控制室安装强制覆写芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the eastern power plant to power the Securitron Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动东部发电厂，激活电子保安部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exit out to the east side of the Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从东侧离开大坝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head to the Legate's camp and deal with the Legate and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往副帅的大营，与副帅和凯撒军团谈判。

ESP.TRADUIT: 与奥利佛将军和NCR部队谈判。

ESP.TRADUIT: 凯旋回到豪斯先生处。
